bug.author: znation
bug.summary: Jupyter notebook SFrame.explore ignores title parameter
bug.description:
The Jupyter Notebook integrated SFrame.explore does not honor the title= parameter to explore. See screenshots for comparison with GUI explore: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/62999193-7efa2900-be22-11e9-991d-312e70a4a0c2.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/62999196-815c8300-be22-11e9-89af-a646202bda06.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> Please assign this ticket to me as I would like to try fixing it and contribute .Thanks in advance!
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dhivyaaxim>@dhivyaaxim</denchmark-link> , sure, thanks for volunteering! I've assigned this issue to you.
